lexUnit.name: bewildered.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: experiencing disturbing confusion and puzzlement

sentence.text: “ What in the world … ? ” began Rose , feeling quite bewildered as he let out an amused laugh .
Lucy felt slightly bewildered , but hid the fact as she turned to Stella .
She frowned , feeling slightly bewildered .
A delighted , if somewhat bewildered smile tugging at her own mouth , her eyes alight with laughter , she watched him melt into the crowds .
Schellenberg went out , closing the door , feeling totally bewildered .
Joey seemed bewildered as he put one large hand on his mother 's shoulder .
Andrus seemed totally bewildered .
At first , she was utterly bewildered when he burst out laughing .
Kate 's voice was husky and bewildered .
` Please do , " said Ianthe , who was temporarily a little bewildered at Penelope 's appearance and unconventional clothes .
BANGOR 'S Alex Lightbody must be the most bewildered bowler in the NIBA this season .
By now Nutmeg was so bewildered that he did n't know what to do .
Natasha laughed at Maggie 's bewildered expression .
Benny looked around him , a bewildered expression on his face .
He saw the bewildered look on Hencke 's face and led him towards two comfortable chairs which stood on either side of a low occasional table .
And she did , leaving a very bewildered Ellie to look round her at the well-equipped kitchen and the gently steaming kettle .
The sweat of moving packs of eighty pounds through the crush of bewildered , nervous men .
Some even asked the bewildered woman to sign their jeans .
A bewildered Dick Francis walks back to the weighing room as Devon Loch is led away .
When she still looked bewildered he said more harshly , ` I 'll take the heat off if you 'll show some appreciation . "
What 's so terrible for IMP in that ? " she blustered , still bewildered why he should find the idea of it so important .
Police found the exhausted pensioner bewildered by the roadside .
At a nervous and hurriedly arranged press conference , the Ibrox publicity machine could barely paper the cracks between the departing boss and his bewildered chairman .
Within moments the bewildered assistant cooks had tied the ropes to the cauldron and suspended the boiling mass over a forked spit rest .
She just looked up at him with bewildered eyes and he put her firmly away , turning to launch himself into the water .
Michael frowned at him , bewildered .
She was feeling hurt and a little bewildered .
The children , at least the younger ones , become bewildered and distraught .
A bewildered and shocked survivor can be guided through red tape , and practical alternatives can be found , as in the case of Liz and Tom who were burgled while on Income Support .

Depressed and bewildered because it had inexplicably impaired his ability to think and concentrate , he soon guessed that his paralysis and clumsiness would make him always dependent on a wheelchair .
